title: Roda Mundo – Ana Mazzotti
comment:
煌めくエレピとふくよかなベースが渦を巻くように絡み合う。
要所に差し込まれる多層的な電子音がほんのりサイケなブラジリアン・ジャズのムードを運ぶ一曲。

Shimmering electric piano and full, rounded bass coil together in a swirling interplay.
Layered electronic touches dropped in at key moments bring a gently psychedelic Brazilian jazz mood to this track.
